content: I am a PhD student at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the IIT Kanpur under Indranil Saha. I am working on synthesis of safe and robust controllers for safety-critical CPSs. I completed my MS (Research) from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, at IIT Kanpur, where I worked on development of a debugger for CPS models. I have worked at OptumSoft, Bangalore for 2 years, where I developed application software for distributed systems.
summary: I am a PhD student at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the IIT Kanpur under Indranil Saha. I am working on synthesis of safe and robust controllers for safety-critical CPSs.
title: Nikhil Kumar Singh

authors: Nikhil Kumar Singh and Indranil Saha
title: Specification-Guided Automated Synthesis of Feedback Controllers

authors: Nikhil Kumar Singh and Indranil Saha
title: Specification-Guided Automated Debugging of CPS Models
